rules.description: Change caps_lock to 'map' layer, if alone caps_lock and sound

to.shell_command:
source ~/.config/karabiner-util.sh
menu 'menu item "Left of Screen" of menu 1 of menu item "Full Screen Tile" of menu 1 of menu bar item "Window"'

source ~/.config/karabiner-util.sh
menu 'menu item "Right of Screen" of menu 1 of menu item "Full Screen Tile" of menu 1 of menu bar item "Window"'

source ~/.config/karabiner-util.sh
menu 'process "Rectangle"' 'menu item "Left Half" of menu 1' 2

source ~/.config/karabiner-util.sh
menu 'process "Rectangle"' 'menu item "Right Half" of menu 1' 2

source ~/.config/karabiner-util.sh
ignoreEvents=$(defaults read org.p0deje.Maccy ignoreEvents)
                                  defaults write org.p0deje.Maccy ignoreEvents true
                                  menu 'menu item "Copy" of menu 1 of menu bar item "Edit"'
                                  defaults write org.p0deje.Maccy ignoreEvents $ignoreEvents
                                  read -d '' output <<< "$(pbpaste | tr -d '[:space:]' | bc -l 2>&1)"
                                  printf %s "$output" | pbcopy
                                  menu 'menu item "Paste" of menu 1 of menu bar item "Edit"'
